00192 BOOLEAN EnterBobbyR()
00193 {
00194   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00195       UINT8 i;
00196 
00197       // an array of mouse regions for the bobbies signs.  Top Left corner, bottom right corner
00198       UINT16  usMouseRegionPosArray[] = {BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_Y, BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_X+BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_WIDTH, BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_Y+BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_HEIGHT,
00199                                                                                                        BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_Y, BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_X+BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_WIDTH, BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_Y+BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_HEIGHT,
00200                                                                                                        BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_Y, BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_X+BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_WIDTH, BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_Y+BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_HEIGHT,
00201                                                                                                        BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_Y, BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_X+BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_WIDTH, BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_Y+BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_HEIGHT,
00202                                                                                                        BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_Y, BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_X+BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_WIDTH, BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_Y+BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_HEIGHT};
00203 
00204       InitBobbyRWoodBackground();
00205 
00206       // load the Bobbyname graphic and add it
00207       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00208       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_BOBBYNAME );
00209       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBobbyName));
00210 
00211       // load the plaque graphic and add it
00212       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00213       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyPlaques.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00214       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPlaque));
00215 
00216       // load the TopHinge graphic and add it
00217       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00218       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyTopHinge.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00219       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTopHinge));
00220 
00221       // load the BottomHinge graphic and add it
00222       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00223       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyBottomHinge.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00224       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBottomHinge));
00225 
00226       // load the Store Plaque graphic and add it
00227       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00228       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_STOREPLAQUE );
00229       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiStorePlaque));
00230 
00231       // load the Handle graphic and add it
00232       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00233       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyHandle.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00234       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiHandle));
00235 
00236 
00237       InitBobbiesMouseRegion(BOBBIES_NUMBER_SIGNS, usMouseRegionPosArray, gSelectedBobbiesSignMenuRegion);
00238 
00239 
00240       if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00241       {
00242             // load the Handle graphic and add it
00243             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00244             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\UnderConstruction.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00245             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiUnderConstructionImage));
00246 
00247             for(i=0; i<BOBBIES_NUMBER_SIGNS; i++)
00248             {
00249                   MSYS_DisableRegion( &gSelectedBobbiesSignMenuRegion[i] );
00250             }
00251 
00252             LaptopSaveInfo.ubHaveBeenToBobbyRaysAtLeastOnceWhileUnderConstruction = BOBBYR_BEEN_TO_SITE_ONCE;
00253       }
00254 
00255 
00256       SetBookMark(BOBBYR_BOOKMARK);
00257       HandleBobbyRUnderConstructionAni( TRUE );
00258 
00259       RenderBobbyR();
00260 
00261       return( TRUE );
00262 }
00263 
00264 void ExitBobbyR()
00265 {
00266 
00267       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBobbyName);
00268       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPlaque);
00269       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiTopHinge);
00270       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBottomHinge);
00271       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiStorePlaque);
00272       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiHandle);
00273 
00274       if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00275       {
00276             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiUnderConstructionImage);
00277       }
00278       
00279 
00280       DeleteBobbyRWoodBackground();
00281 
00282       RemoveBobbiesMouseRegion(BOBBIES_NUMBER_SIGNS, gSelectedBobbiesSignMenuRegion);
00283 
00284       guiLastBobbyRayPage = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
00285 }
00286 
00287 void HandleBobbyR()
00288 {
00289       HandleBobbyRUnderConstructionAni( FALSE );
00290 }
00291 
00292 void RenderBobbyR()
00293 {
00294   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00295       HVOBJECT hStorePlaqueHandle;
00296       
00297       DrawBobbyRWoodBackground();
00298 
00299       // Bobby's Name
00300       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBobbyName);
00301   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,BOBBY_RAYS_NAME_X, BOBBY_RAYS_NAME_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00302 
00303       // Plaque
00304       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiPlaque);
00305   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,BOBBYS_PLAQUES_X, BOBBYS_PLAQUES_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00306 
00307       // Top Hinge
00308       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiTopHinge);
00309   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,BOBBIES_TOPHINGE_X, BOBBIES_TOPHINGE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00310 
00311       // Bottom Hinge
00312       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBottomHinge);
00313   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,BOBBIES_BOTTOMHINGE_X, BOBBIES_BOTTOMHINGE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00314       
00315       // StorePlaque
00316       GetVideoObject(&hStorePlaqueHandle, guiStorePlaque);
00317   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hStorePlaqueHandle, 0,BOBBIES_STORE_PLAQUE_X, BOBBIES_STORE_PLAQUE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00318       
00319       // Handle
00320       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiHandle);
00321   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,BOBBIES_HANDLE_X, BOBBIES_HANDLE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00322 
00323 /*
00324       if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00325       {
00326             // The undercontsruction graphic 
00327             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiUnderConstructionImage );
00328             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,BOBBIES_FIRST_SENTENCE_X, BOBBIES_FIRST_SENTENCE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00329             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,BOBBIES_3RD_SENTENCE_X, BOBBIES_3RD_SENTENCE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00330       }
00331 */
00332 
00333       SetFontShadow(BOBBIES_SENTENCE_BACKGROUNDCOLOR);
00334 
00335 
00336       if( LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00337       {
00338             //Bobbys first sentence
00339       //    ShadowText( FRAME_BUFFER, BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_ADVERTISMENT_1], BOBBIES_SENTENCE_FONT, BOBBIES_FIRST_SENTENCE_X, BOBBIES_FIRST_SENTENCE_Y );
00340             DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_ADVERTISMENT_1], BOBBIES_FIRST_SENTENCE_X, BOBBIES_FIRST_SENTENCE_Y, BOBBIES_FIRST_SENTENCE_WIDTH, BOBBIES_SENTENCE_FONT, BOBBIES_SENTENCE_COLOR, BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | TEXT_SHADOWED );
00341 
00342             //Bobbys second sentence
00343             DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_ADVERTISMENT_2], BOBBIES_2ND_SENTENCE_X, BOBBIES_2ND_SENTENCE_Y, BOBBIES_2ND_SENTENCE_WIDTH, BOBBIES_SENTENCE_FONT, BOBBIES_SENTENCE_COLOR, BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | TEXT_SHADOWED );
00344             SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00345       }
00346 
00347 
00348       SetFontShadow(BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKGROUNDCOLOR);
00349       //Text on the Used Sign
00350       DisplayWrappedString(BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_TEXT_OFFSET, BOBBIES_USED_SIGN_WIDTH-5, 2, BOBBIES_SIGN_FONT, BOBBIES_SIGN_COLOR, BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_USED], BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00351       //Text on the Misc Sign
00352       DisplayWrappedString(BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_TEXT_OFFSET, BOBBIES_MISC_SIGN_WIDTH, 2, BOBBIES_SIGN_FONT, BOBBIES_SIGN_COLOR, BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_MISC], BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00353       //Text on the Guns Sign
00354       DisplayWrappedString(BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_TEXT_OFFSET, BOBBIES_GUNS_SIGN_WIDTH, 2, BOBBIES_SIGN_FONT, BOBBIES_SIGN_COLOR, BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_GUNS], BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00355       //Text on the Ammo Sign
00356       DisplayWrappedString(BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_TEXT_OFFSET, BOBBIES_AMMO_SIGN_WIDTH, 2, BOBBIES_SIGN_FONT, BOBBIES_SIGN_COLOR, BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_AMMO], BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00357       //Text on the Armour Sign
00358       DisplayWrappedString(BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_X, BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_TEXT_OFFSET, BOBBIES_ARMOUR_SIGN_WIDTH, 2, BOBBIES_SIGN_FONT, BOBBIES_SIGN_COLOR, BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_ARMOR], BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00359       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00360 
00361 
00362       if( LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00363       {
00364             //Bobbys Third sentence
00365             SetFontShadow(BOBBIES_SENTENCE_BACKGROUNDCOLOR);
00366             DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRaysFrontText[BOBBYR_ADVERTISMENT_3], BOBBIES_3RD_SENTENCE_X, BOBBIES_3RD_SENTENCE_Y, BOBBIES_3RD_SENTENCE_WIDTH, BOBBIES_SENTENCE_FONT, BOBBIES_SENTENCE_COLOR, BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | TEXT_SHADOWED );
00367             SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
00368       }
00369 
00370       //if we cant go to any sub pages, darken the page out
00371       if( !LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00372       {
00373             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y );
00374       }
00375 
00376       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00377   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00378 }

00383 BOOLEAN InitBobbyRWoodBackground()
00384 {
00385   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00386 
00387       // load the Wood bacground graphic and add it
00388       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00389       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyWood.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00390       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiWoodBackground));
00391 
00392       return(TRUE);
00393 }
00394 
00395 BOOLEAN DeleteBobbyRWoodBackground()
00396 {
00397       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiWoodBackground);
00398       return(TRUE);
00399 }
00400 
00401 
00402 BOOLEAN DrawBobbyRWoodBackground()
00403 {
00404   HVOBJECT hWoodBackGroundHandle;
00405       UINT16      x,y, uiPosX, uiPosY;
00406 
00407       // Blt the Wood background
00408       GetVideoObject(&hWoodBackGroundHandle, guiWoodBackground);
00409 
00410       uiPosY = BOBBY_WOOD_BACKGROUND_Y;
00411       for(y=0; y<4; y++)
00412       {
00413             uiPosX = BOBBY_WOOD_BACKGROUND_X;
00414             for(x=0; x<4; x++)
00415             {
00416               BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hWoodBackGroundHandle, 0,uiPosX, uiPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00417                   uiPosX += BOBBY_WOOD_BACKGROUND_WIDTH;
00418             }
00419             uiPosY += BOBBY_WOOD_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT;
00420       }
00421 
00422       return(TRUE);
00423 }
00424 
00425 
00426 BOOLEAN InitBobbiesMouseRegion(UINT8 ubNumerRegions, UINT16 *usMouseRegionPosArray, MOUSE_REGION *MouseRegion)
00427 {
00428       UINT8 i,ubCount=0;
00429 
00430       for(i=0; i<ubNumerRegions; i++)
00431       {
00432             //Mouse region for the toc buttons
00433             MSYS_DefineRegion( &MouseRegion[i], usMouseRegionPosArray[ubCount], usMouseRegionPosArray[ubCount+1], usMouseRegionPosArray[ubCount+2], usMouseRegionPosArray[ubCount+3], MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00434                                                  CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectBobbiesSignMenuRegionCallBack); 
00435             MSYS_AddRegion(&MouseRegion[i]); 
00436             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &MouseRegion[i], 0, gubBobbyRPages[i]);         
00437 
00438             ubCount +=4;
00439       }
00440 
00441 
00442       return(TRUE);
00443 }

00502 
00503 void HandleBobbyRUnderConstructionAni( BOOLEAN fReset )
00504 {
00505   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00506       static UINT32     uiLastTime=1;
00507       static UINT16     usCount=0;
00508       UINT32      uiCurTime=GetJA2Clock();
00509 
00510 
00511       if( LaptopSaveInfo.fBobbyRSiteCanBeAccessed )
00512             return;
00513 
00514       if( fReset )
00515             usCount =1;
00516 
00517       if( fShowBookmarkInfo )
00518       {
00519             fReDrawBookMarkInfo = TRUE;
00520       }
00521 
00522       if( ( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_ANI_DELAY )||( fReDrawScreenFlag ) )
00523       {
00524             // The undercontsruction graphic 
00525             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiUnderConstructionImage );
00526             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, usCount, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_X, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00527 
00528             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, usCount, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_X, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION1_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00529 
00530             DrawTextToScreen( BobbyRaysFrontText[ BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION ], BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_TEXT_X, BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_TEXT_Y, BOBBYR_UNDER_CONSTRUCTION_TEXT_WIDTH, FONT16ARIAL, BOBBIES_SENTENCE_COLOR, BOBBIES_SIGN_BACKCOLOR, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | INVALIDATE_TEXT );
00531 
00532         InvalidateRegion( BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_X, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_Y, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_X+BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_WIDTH, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_Y+BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_HEIGHT );
00533         InvalidateRegion( BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_X, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION1_Y, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_X+BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_WIDTH, BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION1_Y+BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_HEIGHT );
00534 
00535             uiLastTime = GetJA2Clock();
00536 
00537             usCount++;
00538 
00539             if( usCount >= BOBBYR_UNDERCONSTRUCTION_NUM_FRAMES )
00540                   usCount = 0;
00541       }
00542 }

00545 
00546 void InitBobbyRayInventory()
00547 {
00548       //Initializes which NEW items can be bought at Bobby Rays
00549       InitBobbyRayNewInventory();
00550 
00551       //Initializes the starting values for Bobby Rays NEW Inventory
00552       SetupStoreInventory( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory, FALSE );
00553 
00554       //Initializes which USED items can be bought at Bobby Rays
00555       InitBobbyRayUsedInventory();
00556 
00557       //Initializes the starting values for Bobby Rays USED Inventory
00558       SetupStoreInventory( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory, TRUE);
00559 }
00560 
00561 
00562 BOOLEAN InitBobbyRayNewInventory()
00563 {
00564       UINT16      i;
00565       UINT16      usBobbyrIndex = 0;
00566 
00567 
00568       memset( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory, 0, sizeof(STORE_INVENTORY) * MAXITEMS);
00569 
00570       // add all the NEW items he can ever sell into his possible inventory list, for now in order by item #
00571       for( i = 0; i < MAXITEMS; i++ )
00572       {
00573             //if Bobby Ray sells this, it can be sold, and it's allowed into this game (some depend on e.g. gun-nut option)
00574 //          if( ( StoreInventory[ i ][ BOBBY_RAY_NEW ] != 0) && !( Item[ i ].fFlags & ITEM_NOT_BUYABLE ) && ItemIsLegal( i ) )
00575             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ usBobbyrIndex ].usItemIndex = i;
00576             usBobbyrIndex++;
00577       }
00578 
00579       if ( usBobbyrIndex > 1 )
00580       {
00581             // sort this list by object category, and by ascending price within each category
00582             qsort( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory, usBobbyrIndex, sizeof( STORE_INVENTORY ), BobbyRayItemQsortCompare );
00583       }
00584 
00585 
00586       // remember how many entries in the list are valid
00587       LaptopSaveInfo.usInventoryListLength[ BOBBY_RAY_NEW ] = usBobbyrIndex;
00588       // also mark the end of the list of valid item entries
00589       LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ usBobbyrIndex ].usItemIndex = BOBBYR_NO_ITEMS;
00590 
00591       return(TRUE);
00592 }
00593 
00594 
00595 BOOLEAN InitBobbyRayUsedInventory()
00596 {
00597       UINT16      i;
00598       UINT16      usBobbyrIndex = 0;
00599 
00600 
00601       memset( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory, 0, sizeof(STORE_INVENTORY) * MAXITEMS);
00602 
00603       // add all the NEW items he can ever sell into his possible inventory list, for now in order by item #
00604       for( i = 0; i < MAXITEMS; i++ )
00605       {
00606             //if Bobby Ray sells this, it can be sold, and it's allowed into this game (some depend on e.g. gun-nut option)
00607 //          if( ( StoreInventory[ i ][ BOBBY_RAY_USED ] != 0) && !( Item[ i ].fFlags & ITEM_NOT_BUYABLE ) && ItemIsLegal( i ) )
00608             // in case his store inventory list is wrong, make sure this category of item can be sold used
00609             if ( CanDealerItemBeSoldUsed( i ) )
00610             {
00611                   LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usBobbyrIndex ].usItemIndex = i;
00612                   usBobbyrIndex++;
00613             }
00614       }
00615 
00616       if ( usBobbyrIndex > 1 )
00617       {
00618             // sort this list by object category, and by ascending price within each category
00619             qsort( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory, usBobbyrIndex, sizeof( STORE_INVENTORY ), BobbyRayItemQsortCompare );
00620       }
00621 
00622       // remember how many entries in the list are valid
00623       LaptopSaveInfo.usInventoryListLength[BOBBY_RAY_USED] = usBobbyrIndex;
00624       // also mark the end of the list of valid item entries
00625       LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usBobbyrIndex ].usItemIndex = BOBBYR_NO_ITEMS;
00626 
00627       return(TRUE);
00628 }

00630 
00631 
00632 void DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysNewInventory()
00633 {
00634       INT32 i;
00635       UINT16 usItemIndex;
00636       BOOLEAN fPrevElig;
00637 
00638       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysNewInventory: list length = %d", LaptopSaveInfo.usInventoryListLength[BOBBY_RAY_NEW]));
00639 
00640       //simulate other buyers by reducing the current quantity on hand
00641       SimulateBobbyRayCustomer(LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory, BOBBY_RAY_NEW);
00642 
00643       //loop through all items BR can stock to see what needs reordering
00644       for(i = 0; i < LaptopSaveInfo.usInventoryListLength[BOBBY_RAY_NEW]; i++)
00645       {
00646             // the index is NOT the item #, get that from the table
00647             usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
00648 
00649             Assert(usItemIndex < MAXITEMS);
00650 
00651             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysNewInventory: checking item = %d, qty on order = %d",usItemIndex,LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder));
00652             // make sure this item is still sellable in the latest version of the store inventory
00653             if ( StoreInventory[ usItemIndex ][ BOBBY_RAY_NEW ] == 0 )
00654             {
00655                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysNewInventory: skipping item = %d",usItemIndex));
00656                   continue;
00657             }
00658 
00659             //if the item isn't already on order
00660             if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder == 0 || gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay == BR_AWESOME )
00661             {
00662                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysNewInventory: item = %d, qty on hand = %d, half desired amount = %d",usItemIndex,LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand,(StoreInventory[ usItemIndex ][ BOBBY_RAY_NEW ] * gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay )/2));
00663                   //if the qty on hand is half the desired amount or fewer
00664                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand <= (StoreInventory[ usItemIndex ][ BOBBY_RAY_NEW ] * gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay )/2 )
00665                   {
00666                         // remember value of the "previously eligible" flag
00667                         fPrevElig = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].fPreviouslyEligible;
00668 
00669                         //determine if any can/should be ordered, and how many
00670                         LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder = HowManyBRItemsToOrder( usItemIndex, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand, BOBBY_RAY_NEW);
00671 
00672                         //if he found some to buy
00673                         if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder > 0 )
00674                         {
00675                               // if this is the first day the player is eligible to have access to this thing
00676                               if ( !fPrevElig || gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay == BR_AWESOME )
00677                               {
00678                                     DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysNewInventory: item = %d, add fresh inventory",usItemIndex));
00679                                     // eliminate the ordering delay and stock the items instantly!
00680                                     // This is just a way to reward the player right away for making progress without the reordering lag...
00681                                     AddFreshBobbyRayInventory( usItemIndex );
00682                               }
00683                               else
00684                               {
00685                                     OrderBobbyRItem(usItemIndex);
00686 
00687 #ifdef BR_INVENTORY_TURNOVER_DEBUG
00688                                     if ( usItemIndex == ROCKET_LAUNCHER )
00689                                           MapScreenMessage( 0, MSG_DEBUG, L"%s: BR Ordered %d, Has %d", WORLDTIMESTR, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand );
00690 #endif
00691                               }
00692                         }
00693                   }
00694             }
00695       }
00696 }
00697 
00698 
00699 void DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysUsedInventory()
00700 {
00701       INT16 i;
00702       UINT16 usItemIndex;
00703       BOOLEAN fPrevElig;
00704 
00705       //simulate other buyers by reducing the current quantity on hand
00706       SimulateBobbyRayCustomer(LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory, BOBBY_RAY_USED);
00707 
00708       for(i = 0; i < LaptopSaveInfo.usInventoryListLength[BOBBY_RAY_USED]; i++)
00709       {
00710             //if the used item isn't already on order
00711             if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder == 0 || gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay == BR_AWESOME )
00712             {
00713                   //if we don't have ANY
00714                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand == 0 )
00715                   {
00716                         // the index is NOT the item #, get that from the table
00717                         usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
00718                         Assert(usItemIndex < MAXITEMS);
00719 
00720                         // make sure this item is still sellable in the latest version of the store inventory
00721                         if ( StoreInventory[ usItemIndex ][ BOBBY_RAY_USED ] == 0 )
00722                         {
00723                               continue;
00724                         }
00725 
00726                         // remember value of the "previously eligible" flag
00727                         fPrevElig = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].fPreviouslyEligible;
00728 
00729                         //determine if any can/should be ordered, and how many
00730                         LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder = HowManyBRItemsToOrder(usItemIndex, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand, BOBBY_RAY_USED);
00731 
00732                         //if he found some to buy
00733                         if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder > 0 )
00734                         {
00735                               // if this is the first day the player is eligible to have access to this thing
00736                               if ( !fPrevElig || gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay == BR_AWESOME )
00737                               {
00738                                     // eliminate the ordering delay and stock the items instantly!
00739                                     // This is just a way to reward the player right away for making progress without the reordering lag...
00740                                     AddFreshBobbyRayInventory( usItemIndex );
00741                               }
00742                               else
00743                               {
00744                                     OrderBobbyRItem((INT16) (usItemIndex + BOBBY_R_USED_PURCHASE_OFFSET));
00745                               }
00746                         }
00747                   }
00748             }
00749       }
00750 }
00751 
00752 
00753 //returns the number of items to order
00754 UINT8 HowManyBRItemsToOrder(UINT16 usItemIndex, UINT8 ubCurrentlyOnHand, UINT8 ubBobbyRayNewUsed )
00755 {
00756       UINT8 ubItemsOrdered = 0;
00757 
00758       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HowManyBRItemsToOrder: item = %d",usItemIndex));
00759 
00760       Assert(usItemIndex < MAXITEMS);
00761       // formulas below will fail if there are more items already in stock than optimal
00762       //Assert(ubCurrentlyOnHand <= StoreInventory[ usItemIndex ][ ubBobbyRayNewUsed ] * gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay) ;
00763       Assert(ubBobbyRayNewUsed < BOBBY_RAY_LISTS);
00764 
00765 
00766       // decide if he can get stock for this item (items are reordered an entire batch at a time)
00767       if (ItemTransactionOccurs( -1, usItemIndex, DEALER_BUYING, ubBobbyRayNewUsed ))
00768       {
00769             if (ubBobbyRayNewUsed == BOBBY_RAY_NEW)
00770             {
00771                   ubItemsOrdered = HowManyItemsToReorder(StoreInventory[ usItemIndex ][ ubBobbyRayNewUsed ] * gGameOptions.ubBobbyRay, ubCurrentlyOnHand);
00772             }
00773             else
00774             {
00775                   //Since these are used items we only should order 1 of each type
00776                   ubItemsOrdered = 1;
00777             }
00778       }
00779       else
00780       {
00781             // can't obtain this item from suppliers
00782             ubItemsOrdered = 0;
00783       }
00784 
00785 
00786       return(ubItemsOrdered);
00787 }
00788 
00789 
00790 void OrderBobbyRItem(UINT16 usItemIndex)
00791 {
00792       UINT32 uiArrivalTime;
00793 
00794       //add the new item to the queue.  The new item will arrive in 'uiArrivalTime' minutes.
00795       uiArrivalTime = BOBBY_R_NEW_PURCHASE_ARRIVAL_TIME + Random( BOBBY_R_NEW_PURCHASE_ARRIVAL_TIME / 2 );
00796       uiArrivalTime += GetWorldTotalMin();
00797       AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_UPDATE_BOBBY_RAY_INVENTORY, uiArrivalTime, usItemIndex);
00798 }
00799 
00800 
00801 void AddFreshBobbyRayInventory( UINT16 usItemIndex )
00802 {
00803       INT16 sInventorySlot;
00804       STORE_INVENTORY *pInventoryArray;
00805       BOOLEAN fUsed;
00806       UINT8 ubItemQuality;
00807 
00808       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddFreshBobbyRayInventory: item = %d", usItemIndex ));
00809 
00810       if( usItemIndex >= BOBBY_R_USED_PURCHASE_OFFSET )
00811       {
00812             usItemIndex -= BOBBY_R_USED_PURCHASE_OFFSET;
00813             pInventoryArray = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory;
00814             fUsed = BOBBY_RAY_USED;
00815             ubItemQuality = 20 + (UINT8) Random( 60 );
00816       }
00817       else
00818       {
00819             pInventoryArray = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory;
00820             fUsed = BOBBY_RAY_NEW;
00821             ubItemQuality = 100;
00822       }
00823 
00824 
00825       // find out which inventory slot that item is stored in
00826       sInventorySlot = GetInventorySlotForItem(pInventoryArray, usItemIndex, fUsed);
00827       if (sInventorySlot == -1)
00828       {
00829             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddFreshBobbyRayInventory: item not found! = %d", usItemIndex ));
00830             AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "AddFreshBobbyRayInventory(), Item %d not found.  AM-0.", usItemIndex ) );
00831             return;
00832       }
00833 
00834       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,String("AddFreshBobbyRayInventory: item = %d, qty on hand = %d, qty on order = %d", usItemIndex,pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubQtyOnHand, pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubQtyOnOrder ));
00835 
00836       pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubQtyOnHand += pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubQtyOnOrder;
00837       pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubItemQuality = ubItemQuality;
00838 
00839 #ifdef BR_INVENTORY_TURNOVER_DEBUG
00840       if ( usItemIndex == ROCKET_LAUNCHER && !fUsed )
00841             MapScreenMessage( 0, MSG_DEBUG, L"%s: BR Bought %d, Has %d", WORLDTIMESTR, pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubQtyOnOrder, pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubQtyOnHand );
00842 #endif
00843 
00844       // cancel order
00845       pInventoryArray[ sInventorySlot ].ubQtyOnOrder = 0;
00846 }
00847 
00848 
00849 INT16 GetInventorySlotForItem(STORE_INVENTORY *pInventoryArray, UINT16 usItemIndex, BOOLEAN fUsed)
00850 {
00851       INT16 i;
00852 
00853       for(i = 0; i < LaptopSaveInfo.usInventoryListLength[fUsed]; i++)
00854       {
00855             //if we have some of this item in stock
00856             if( pInventoryArray[ i ].usItemIndex == usItemIndex)
00857             {
00858                   return(i);
00859             }
00860       }
00861 
00862       // not found!
00863       return(-1);
00864 }
00865 
00866 
00867 void SimulateBobbyRayCustomer(STORE_INVENTORY *pInventoryArray, BOOLEAN fUsed)
00868 {
00869       INT16 i;
00870       UINT8 ubItemsSold;
00871 
00872       //loop through all items BR can stock to see what gets sold
00873       for(i = 0; i < LaptopSaveInfo.usInventoryListLength[fUsed]; i++)
00874       {
00875             //if we have some of this item in stock
00876             if( pInventoryArray[ i ].ubQtyOnHand > 0)
00877             {
00878                   ubItemsSold = HowManyItemsAreSold( -1, pInventoryArray[ i ].usItemIndex, pInventoryArray[ i ].ubQtyOnHand, fUsed);
00879                   pInventoryArray[ i ].ubQtyOnHand -= ubItemsSold;
00880 
00881 #ifdef BR_INVENTORY_TURNOVER_DEBUG
00882                   if (ubItemsSold > 0 )
00883                   {
00884                         if ( i == ROCKET_LAUNCHER && !fUsed )
00885                               MapScreenMessage( 0, MSG_DEBUG, L"%s: BR Sold %d, Has %d", WORLDTIMESTR, ubItemsSold, pInventoryArray[ i ].ubQtyOnHand );
00886                   }
00887 #endif
00888             }
00889       }
00890 }
00891 
00892 
00893 void CancelAllPendingBRPurchaseOrders(void)
00894 {
00895       INT16 i;
00896 
00897       // remove all the BR-Order events off the event queue
00898       DeleteAllStrategicEventsOfType( EVENT_UPDATE_BOBBY_RAY_INVENTORY );
00899 
00900       // zero out all the quantities on order
00901       for(i = 0; i < MAXITEMS; i++)
00902       {
00903             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder = 0;
00904             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnOrder = 0;
00905       }
00906 
00907       // do an extra daily update immediately to create new reorders ASAP
00908       DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysNewInventory();
00909       DailyUpdateOfBobbyRaysUsedInventory();
00910 }
